name: Quarantine Jumper
description:
A fun platformer game where you can never trust what you are seeing!

Even the menu screen isn't telling the truth- options goes to the play screen and play goes to the options screen!

You can buy upgrades in the shop, but you might not be able to trust them...

The instructions are in the shop.

Press P to pause.

Edit: Platformer physics are broken, but tower defense levels work.
